about.subtitle: Bleverse Relivator is a powerful Next.js TypeScript Tailwind starter. It streamlines the development process and provides a solid foundation for creating web projects. Feel free to use, adapt, and contribute to the project by {link}.

hero.description: Join the Relivator community. Choose the plan that suits you best.

questions.answer-card: A la carte pricing allows you to customize your plan based on your specific needs. You only pay for the features you need.
questions.answer-change: Yes, you can change plans at any time.
questions.answer-free: Yes, Relivator offers a free plan with a basic feature set. You can use it free of charge.
questions.answer-limits: If you exceed your plan limits, you can either upgrade your plan to get more resources or pay additional fees based on your excess usage.
questions.answer-nonprofit: Yes, we offer discounts for nonprofits and educational institutions. Contact us for more details.
questions.answer-payment: We accept credit card payments and secure online payments. You can also choose to pay monthly or annually.
questions.answer-teams: Pricing for teams is based on the number of team members. You can add or remove team members at any time, and your billing will be adjusted accordingly.
questions.are-prices: Are the prices monthly or yearly?
questions.do-you-offer: Do you offer discounts for nonprofits or educational institutions?
questions.how-does: How does ├а la carte pricing work?
questions.how-is: How is pricing calculated for teams?
questions.is-there: Is there a free version of Relivator?
questions.what-happens: What happens if I exceed my plan limits?
questions.what-payment: What payment methods do you accept?
